talk.author: did:plc:pg5vxcnlcenif2dkkpvz56vh
talk.utter: This is a problem, the whole “we’re smarter” thing. If we were really smarter wouldn’t we convince folks and win elections? Smarter is not the issue, dis- information and lying is the issue and until the “smarter” folk figure this out here we remain

talk.author: did:plc:x4hw5n3vjpdmypmohrcvwtaz
talk.utter: A good percentage of the problem here is that many people are threatened by and resent “smarter.” The smartest kid in class is the one who gets stuffed in a locker. In other words, we may need a messaging shift because “smarter” isn’t working.
